title: Herbal Summer School | Adults only - DAY 3
description: Herbal Summer School | Adults only - DAY 3 Hosted By Katie Holden, Herbalist. Event starts on Saturday, 23 September 2023 and happening at Pimp Hall Nature Reserve, London, EN. Register or Buy Tickets, Price information.
cleaned_text: Sat Sep 23 2023 at 10:00 am to 03:00 pm (GMT+01:00) Pimp Hall Nature Reserve, Learning Lodge, London, United Kingdom Join family herbalist and naturopath Katie on an adventure with herbal medicine for adults, parents, fellow health advocates! This day retreat welcomes you and your wild magic side. Welcome potion-makers and nature lovers, to discover the many ways to use plants for health. Nature cure and natural remedies: working with the original medicine of humankind. SUMMER SCHOOL | AIMS Celebrate nature's apothecary and discover the medicine growing on your doorstep. Build a handmade home Ph*rm*cy. Share wisdom, stories, curiosity. Gain skills in taking care of yourself. Organic, sustainable, low-cost medicine-making. DAY 3 | CONTENT Herbal swaps: sugar addicts and roller coaster moods Morning session: 10am-12.15pm [inc. break] Learn all about the history of sugar cane, what it does in the body, and why we need to shift our modern palate to more bitter tastes. - taste raw green sugar cane - make Calendula sugar body scrub - taste herbal antidotes like Cinnamon tea, Barberries and Gymnema - make mood balancing herbal roller LUNCH - 12.45PM Afternoon session: 12.45pm-3pm [inc. break] Herbal medicine-making intensive. - make Cardamom and Vanilla raw chocolate - make Fennel seed electuary - make Rose coconut powder I so look forward to sharing the plants with you!
